programme.desc: A Seattle couple with a newly adopted baby is on the hunt for a larger place with spectacular views of the city, but even with a big budget, they find that in this fast-moving market, compromise is necessary.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: Brian and Mika are challenged to turn an overgrown lot into a dream home for an expecting family. The homeowner is also a chef who has stipulations about his kitchen, meaning Brian and Mika have their work cut out for them to create the perfect property.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: After trying to squeeze their large, blended family into a tiny two-bedroom house, a couple finally decides they need to build bigger. Brian and Mika step in to help with the difficult design choices to nail down this couple's style and start building.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: A couple bought their dream property years ago but are living with his mother due to financial setbacks. The family is ready to build a home of their own, but Brian and Mika must find a way to combine her understated style with his over-the-top taste.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: Two engaged police officers have been living in a cramped trailer on rural land they have been trying to clear themselves. Brian and Mika take over the heavy equipment and build this couple's dream home so that they can actually plan their wedding.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: A family of four has lived in six homes over the past 10 years while trying to find their perfect fit. Brian and Mika help them build a home that they think is just right, but when their plans fall through, they'll have to double down to not disappoint.

programme.desc: Contractor and real estate agent brothers should be the perfect flipping team, but their business has been a flop due to opposing priorities. They have no plans for their latest project, so Tarek steps in to guide the tempestuous duo over the finish line.

programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: Patricia and Legacy are professional dancers turned house flippers and a high-end project in Brentwood has them seeing dollar signs. Their hideously expensive loan and a major foundation problem threaten to ruin this flip from the start.

programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: Alison and Mondo are amateur flippers who have not only taken on the worst house on the block, but the worst house Tarek has ever seen.

programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa

programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa

programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa

programme.title: Flipping Across America

programme.title: Flipping Across America
programme.desc: Page and DeRon find themselves dealing with a basement full of water damage that threatens their flip in Nashville. Meanwhile, Jon and Mary have to deal with copper-wire theft and pet damage to a home's restored hardwood floors in Houston, Texas.

programme.title: Flipping Across America

programme.title: Flipping Across America

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House

programme.title: Evil Lives Here

programme.title: Unexplained and Unexplored

programme.title: Unexplained and Unexplored

programme.title: Unexplained and Unexplored

programme.title: Underground Marvels

programme.title: Underground Marvels

programme.desc: The quints have their first sleepover at the Mills when the Busbys are forced to leave their home for a few days. Fearing for the girls' health after prolonged exposure to mold, Danielle and Adam bring them to the doctor to find out if they are at risk.

programme.title: OutDaughtered
programme.desc: Thanksgiving is right around the corner, but celebrating is the last thing on the Busbys' minds. Tensions run high between Adam and Danielle as they continue the hunt for a new house and the quints undergo their first school testing.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Emily, a rock star by night, wants to shake her all-black attire for a traditional gown. Brittany has bright red hair and tattoos and wants to show them off in a sexy lace gown. Lauren is nervous that her friends will think her dress is too unusual.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Daddy's girl, Katie, comes to the salon hoping to find the perfect mermaid style dress.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Cheryl has recently beaten breast cancer and had her last reconstructive surgery a week ago. Jennifer is battling a rare kidney disease, and Kristin is overcoming stage four lung cancer. For these brides, their weddings are a celebration of love and life.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: LaQuet is looking for a fun gown with straps. Kat wants a one-of-a-kind dress with no sweetheart neckline, but the consultants put her in one anyway. Valerie wants a mermaid silhouette until she realizes they may not be for her.

programme.title: Sister Wives
programme.desc: Maddie thinks she's in labour, but it's a false alarm, so Kody heads back to Flagstaff. Kody and Robyn are at wits' end over their struggle to close on her house. Then, Kody and Meri head to their therapist in Vegas, where the brutal truth comes out.

programme.title: Sister Wives
programme.desc: Kody and Robyn are struggling with the bank as the mortgage process is not designed for plural marriage. Then in North Carolina, Maddie's water breaks, at the mall. Evie K is born, but when she has problems breathing, an ambulance is called.

programme.title: Long Island Medium
programme.desc: They say everything is bigger in Texas, and Theresa and Larry's trip there is no exception. Big surprises and big moments unfold as Theresa hits the road again to surprise fans with readings.

programme.title: Long Island Medium
programme.desc: Theresa finds herself reflective as she undertakes two huge events: her largest-ever fundraiser group reading, and the return of her neighborhood block party. And, Theresa turns a skeptic into a believer when she channels a long-deceased spirit.

programme.title: Long Island Medium
programme.desc: At a group reading, Theresa brings closure to a man who has been tortured by his son's death. Theresa gets a brain scan while she's channeling, in the hopes doctors can tell her what goes on in her head when she's channeling spirit.

programme.title: Long Island Medium
programme.desc: Theresa surprises people with readings set up by their friends and family. From a salon to a doughnut shop to pretending to be a substitute babysitter, Theresa is showing up in the most unlikely places to deliver healing.

programme.title: Long Island Medium
programme.desc: For an entire day, Theresa doesn't shut off spirit, which leads to 24 hours of non-stop readings.

programme.title: Long Island Medium
programme.desc: Theresa conducts a group reading for people of different faiths to show how everyone is connected by Spirit. A pastor, a rabbi, a practicing Buddhist and members of the Hindu faith receive meaningful readings.

programme.title: Long Island Medium
programme.desc: Reaching out to fans who've been on her mailing list for a decade, Theresa does a series of big group readings to clear her list. A man grieves as he wasn't able to save his dad, and two moms are reconnected to their children who took their own lives.

programme.title: Long Island Medium
programme.desc: Theresa gives readings to Debbie Gibson, John Schneider from 'Dukes of Hazzard,' Anne Burrell, Dorit Kemsley from 'Real Housewives of Beverly Hills' and Jonathan Lipnicki of 'Jerry Maguire.
